document.full_text: u.s. inflation remains well under control, despite the spike in oil prices, but the federal reserve stands ready to raise interest rates if price pressures appear to be getting out of hand, top fed officials said on wednesday.
document.title: fed ready to fight inflation, but not yet time
lines_and_colors: u.s. inflation remains well under control, despite the spike in oil prices, but the federal reserve stands ready to raise interest rates if price pressures appear to be getting out of hand, top fed officials said on wednesday.
